attributes.action: Deny canoeists and users of un-powered craft the right to roam on English and Welsh rivers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Canoeists and un-powered craft users are seeking the right to roam on English and Welsh rivers. This is without consultation with landowners.
This, in our view, will be detrimental to river systems and will spoil the enjoyment of the rivers for anglers.
Angling clubs already pay rent to landowners for using the rivers as well as anglers paying national rod license fees. The canoeists want the right to spoil our enjoyment for free!

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Deny canoeists and users of un-powered craft the right to roam on English and Welsh rivers."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11845.asp

Prime Minister's Office
